Key Match Events: Amen Thompson threw Tyler Herro to the court, triggering an altercation that resulted in six ejections in the closing minute of Miami's 104-100 victory over Houston.
The altercation became so intense that both benches cleared, resulting in multiple ejections.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tyler Herro and Amen Thompson became entangled with Miami about to inbound the ball leading 99-94 with 35 seconds left.
Referee Marc Davis described Amen Thompson's actions as a 'body slam' on Tyler Herro.
Others: The game was played on Sunday, Dec. 29, in Houston.
The Miami Heat won the game 104-100.
